response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the camera without any errors. Now, the robot needs to grasp the camera.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the camera.
(2) Grasp the camera.
(3) Move the robot to the tripod.
(4) Put the camera on the tripod.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Grasp the camera
    digital_camera_183 = registry(env,"digital_camera_183")
    EasyGrasp(robot, digital_camera_183)
    donothing(env)
